verses.verse: <S%H6605>Open<s%> your <S%H1817>doors,<s%> O <S%H3844>Lebanon,<s%> That a <S%H784>fire<s%> may <S%H398>feed<s%> on your <S%H730>cedars.<s%>

<S%H3213>Wail,<s%> O <S%H1265>cypress,<s%> for the <S%H730>cedar<s%> has <S%H5307>fallen,<s%> <S%H834>Because<s%> the <S%H117>glorious<s%> [trees] have been <S%H7703>destroyed;<s%> <S%H3213>Wail,<s%> O <S%H437>oaks<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan,<s%> For the <S%H1219>impenetrable<s%> <S%H9194>forest<s%> has <S%H3381>come<s%> <S%H3381>down.<s%>

There is a <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the shepherds' <S%H3215>wail,<s%> For their <S%H155>glory<s%> is <S%H7703>ruined;<s%> There is a <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H3715>young<s%> lions' <S%H7581>roar,<s%> For the <S%H1347>pride<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> is <S%H7703>ruined.<s%>

"Those <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H7069>buy<s%> them <S%H2026>slay<s%> them and <S%H816>go<s%> <S%H3808>unpunished,<s%> <S%H816><s%> and [each of] those who <S%H4376>sell<s%> them <S%H559>says,<s%> <S%H1288>'Blessed<s%> be the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> for I have <S%H6238>become<s%> <S%H6238>rich!<s%>' And their own <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> <S%H2550>have<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2550>pity<s%> on them.

"For I shall <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>longer<s%> <S%H2550>have<s%> <S%H2550>pity<s%> on the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> "but <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I shall cause the <S%H120>men<s%> to <S%H4672>fall,<s%> <S%H376>each<s%> into another's <S%H3027>power<s%> and into the <S%H3027>power<s%> of his <S%H4428>king;<s%> and they will <S%H3807>strike<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> and I shall not <S%H5337>deliver<s%> [them] from their <S%H3027>power.<s%>"

So I <S%H7462>pastured<s%> the <S%H6629>flock<s%> [doomed] to <S%H2028>slaughter,<s%> <S%H3651>hence<s%> the <S%H6041>afflicted<s%> of the <S%H6629>flock.<s%> And I <S%H3947>took<s%> for myself <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4731>staffs:<s%> the <S%H259>one<s%> I <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H5278>Favor,<s%> and the <S%H259>other<s%> I <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H9115>Union;<s%> so I <S%H7462>pastured<s%> the <S%H6629>flock.<s%>

Then I <S%H3582>annihilated<s%> the <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3391>month,<s%> for my <S%H5315>soul<s%> was <S%H9527>impatient<s%> with them, and their <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> was <S%H973>weary<s%> of me.

Then I <S%H559>said,<s%> "I will not <S%H7462>pasture<s%> you. What is to <S%H4191>die,<s%> let it <S%H4191>die,<s%> and what is to be <S%H3582>annihilated,<s%> let it be <S%H3582>annihilated;<s%> and let those who are <S%H7604>left<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H802>one<s%> another's <S%H1320>flesh.<s%>"

And I <S%H3947>took<s%> my <S%H4731>staff,<s%> <S%H5278>Favor,<s%> and <S%H1438>cut<s%> it in <S%H1438>pieces,<s%> to <S%H6565>break<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I had <S%H3772>made<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>peoples.<s%>

So it was <S%H6565>broken<s%> on that <S%H3117>day,<s%> and <S%H3651>thus<s%> the <S%H6041>afflicted<s%> of the <S%H6629>flock<s%> who were <S%H8104>watching<s%> me <S%H3045>realized<s%> that it was the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

And I <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H518>"If<s%> it is <S%H2896>good<s%> in your <S%H5869>sight,<s%> <S%H3051>give<s%> [me] my <S%H7939>wages;<s%> but <S%H518>if<s%> not, <S%H2308>never<s%> <S%H2308>mind!<s%>" So they <S%H8254>weighed<s%> out <S%H7970>thirty<s%> [shekels] of <S%H3701>silver<s%> as my wages.

Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H7993>"Throw<s%> it to the <S%H3335>potter,<s%> [that] <S%H145>magnificent<s%> <S%H3366>price<s%> at <S%H834>which<s%> I was <S%H3365>valued<s%> by them." So I <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H7970>thirty<s%> [shekels] of <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H7993>threw<s%> them to the <S%H3335>potter<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

Then I <S%H1438>cut<s%> my <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H4731>staff,<s%> <S%H9115>Union,<s%> in <S%H1438>pieces,<s%> to <S%H6565>break<s%> the <S%H264>brotherhood<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H3947>"Take<s%> <S%H5750>again<s%> for yourself the <S%H3627>equipment<s%> of a <S%H196>foolish<s%> <S%H7462>shepherd.<s%>

"For <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I am going to <S%H6965>raise<s%> up a <S%H7462>shepherd<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> who will not <S%H6485>care<s%> for the <S%H3582>perishing,<s%> <S%H1245>seek<s%> the <S%H5289>scattered,<s%> <S%H7495>heal<s%> the <S%H7665>broken,<s%> or <S%H3557>sustain<s%> the one <S%H5324>standing,<s%> but will <S%H398>devour<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of the <S%H1277>fat<s%> [sheep] and <S%H6561>tear<s%> <S%H6561>off<s%> their <S%H6541>hoofs.<s%>

<S%H1945>"Woe<s%> to the <S%H457>worthless<s%> <S%H7473>shepherd<s%> Who <S%H5800>leaves<s%> the <S%H6629>flock!<s%> A <S%H2719>sword<s%> will be on his <S%H2220>arm<s%> And on his <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H5869>eye!<s%> His <S%H2220>arm<s%> will be <S%H3001>totally<s%> <S%H3001>withered,<s%> And his <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H5869>eye<s%> will be <S%H3543>blind.<s%>"
